solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int numberOfArithmeticSlices(int[] A) {--newline--        int res = 0;--newline--        Map<Integer, Integer>[] map = new Map[A.length];--newline--            --newline--        for (int i = 0; i < A.length; i++) {--newline--            map[i] = new HashMap<>(i);--newline--                --newline--            for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {--newline--                long diff = (long)A[i] - A[j];--newline--                if (diff <= Integer.MIN_VALUE || diff > Integer.MAX_VALUE) continue;--newline--                    --newline--                int d = (int)diff;--newline--                int c1 = map[i].getOrDefault(d, 0);--newline--                int c2 = map[j].getOrDefault(d, 0);--newline--                res += c2;--newline--                map[i].put(d, c1 + c2 + 1);--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--            --newline--        return res;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
